attributes.action: .. award Bobby Moore, OBE a posthumous knighthood for services to football.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Come on Mr Blair, recommend to H.M. the Queen that the captain of England's only winning World Cup team never got the recognition he so richly deserved. The time is now right.

rejection.details: Sorry, the PM has no powers to offer posthumous awards, however worthy the cause
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
